title: Solving Systems of Equations in Word Problems
body: Marissa wants to blend candy selling for $$\$1.80$$ per pound with candy costing $$\$1.20$$ per pound to get a mixture that costs her $$\$1.40$$ per pound to make. She wants to make $$90$$ pounds of the candy blend. How many pounds of each type of candy should she use?
lesson: 5.5 Solve Mixture Applications with Systems of Equations
